title: AirPods 4 Review: Which Ones To Get?
description: AirPods 4 now come in 2 versions: Regular and with Noise Cancellation. Are they any good?  Get dbrands new Area 51 skins at   MKBHD Merch:   Tech I'm using right now:   Playlist of MKBHD Intro music:   Headphones provided by Apple for review.  ~
